content:
# The move command executed successfully, so I should now be at the coordinates of the nearest stone patch.
# Now, I will attempt to place the stone furnace at my current position.

# Placing the stone furnace at the current position, which is now near the stone patch.
furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=nearest_stone_position)  # Place furnace at the stone position
print(f'Furnace placed at: {furnace.position}')  # Confirm placement of the furnace.
